meanings.definition: Difficult or impossible to understand or explain.
meanings.sent1: The old house had a mysterious aura that made everyone curious.
meanings.sent2: The detective was determined to solve the mysterious case.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious disappearance of the cookies left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a mysterious depth that seemed to hide secrets.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious fog enveloped the town, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Involving or suggesting supernatural powers or agencies.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious figure in the dark alley sent shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent2: The fortune teller made mysterious predictions about the future.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious glow in the forest was rumored to be a ghost.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious voice whispered in the haunted house, scaring everyone.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious symbol on the ancient amulet seemed to hold mystical powers.

meanings.definition: Full of or characterized by mystery.
meanings.sent1: The book was filled with mysterious twists and turns that kept me hooked.
meanings.sent2: The magician performed a series of mysterious tricks that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious smile on her face hinted at a hidden agenda.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious melody played by the musician touched the hearts of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious package on the doorstep piqued their curiosity.
